room_title: Escape room "Carnegie's Millions" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
room_description: The Stone of Destiny must not fall into the hands of the Illuminati lest their power doom humanity for millennia to come. As a precaution, the owner of the stone, Andrew Carnegie, have placed it in his secret vault. It is guarded with several high-class security measures. Only those worthy will be able to retrieve the stone and be rewarded with the power to influence mankind toward good and benevolence.
